question: What is the prevalence of poor metabolizers of CYP2C19 among Southern Asians compared to East Asians?
ideal_answer: Southeast Asians exhibit a higher prevalence of CYP2C19-poor metabolisers compared with Caucasians and East Asians.

snippets.text: There is paucity of data on voriconazole therapeutic drug monitoring (TDM) among Southeast Asians, who exhibit a higher prevalence of CYP2C19-poor metabolisers compared with Caucasians and East Asians.
